text: Shei bi jie an la de mingyi niezao huangyan huo fouren ta de jixiang zhe geng bu yi ne? Zhexie ren jiang huode zhuding de fen'e [rujinshi shenghuo de fuhua yu shou xian], zhidao wo de tianshimen jianglin tamen bing qu zou tamen de linghun shi, tamen [tianshi] jiang shuo:“Nimen ceng she an la er chongbai de ouxiang [xianzai] zai nali?” Tamen jiang huida:“Tamen paoqi women xiaoshile.” Tamen jiang dui tamen ziji zuozheng, tamen yuan shi bu xinyang zhe.
